data.title: 45 Best Betting Podcasts You Must Follow in 2024
data.meta_description: List of Best Betting Podcasts. Keep up with sports gambling, sports betting, best bets, betting tips, advice, opinions, free picks, nfl betting, nba betting, matched betting, strategies and much more
data.text:
1. Bet The Board Podcast

NFL and College Football sports betting podcast hosted by Todd Fuhrman and Payne breaking down games from a Gambling perspective.

Podcast bettheboardpodcast.com

Email

Apple Rating 4.8 / 5Facebook Followers 76Twitter Followers 27.9K Frequency 3 episodes / week Avg Length 87 min Listen on Apple Spotify Video Podcast YouTube Play Get Influential Podcasters ContactsGet access to 100k active Podcasters, Influencers in 1500 niche categories.Get targeted media contact list in your niche at your fingertips so you can focus on running your campaign.Email us the categories of Podcasters you want to reach out for your marketing campaign at anuj@feedspot.com Copy email. We'll share active Podcasters list with verified email contacts in an Excel or CSV format.Email us

2. RJ Bell's Dream Preview

Winning sports picks from Las Vegas. Everything you need for free on the biggest games each week from Pregame.com's Wiseguy Roundtable. Alongside your host, we have professional bettors Steve Fezzik and Brad Powers, plus more of the biggest names from the world of sports betting.

Podcast pregame1.libsyn.com

Email

Apple Rating 4.5 / 5Twitter Followers 180.2KInstagram Followers 46.9K Frequency 1 episode / day Avg Length 55 min Listen on Apple Spotify YouTube Play

3. VSiN Best Bets

Joe Ostrowski shares his insights and speaks with the top sports bookmakers and sharpest bettors around to analyze the latest point spreads, totals, futures, and prop bets. The Early Odds covers the NFL, College Football, MLB, NBA, NHL, PGA, and horse racing. Joe is a Chicago sports radio host on 670 The Score that you can track down.

Podcast vsin.com

Producers VSiN, IHeartRadio

Email

Apple Rating 4.3 / 5Facebook Followers 2.5KTwitter Followers 97.9KInstagram Followers 5.1K Frequency 19 episodes / day Avg Length 45 min Listen on Apple Spotify YouTube Play

4. Sports Gambling Podcast

The Sports Gambling Podcast brings you Sports Gambling analysis, advice, opinions and picks for the people by the people. The podcast is hosted by Sean Green, and Ryan Kramer, who bring over 40 years of Sports Gambling experience to the airwaves each and every week. The guys cover the full spectrum of the Sports Gambling universe, including the biggest sports and gambling news stories, fantasy sports previews, handicapping strategy, big game previews, line movement analysis and free picks.

Podcast sportsgamblingpodcast.com

Email

Apple Rating 4.8 / 5Facebook Followers 9.9KTwitter Followers 23KInstagram Followers 10.6K Frequency 10 episodes / week Avg Length 62 min Listen on Apple Spotify Video Podcast YouTube Play

5. The Sal Vetri Show

The Sal Vetri Show is a leader in Fantasy Sports and Sports Betting focusing on bringing you the best information to entertain, inform and prepare you for your Fantasy Contests and Sports Betting Cards.

Podcast podcasters.spotify.com

Email

Apple Rating 5 / 5Facebook Followers 718Twitter Followers 129.3KInstagram Followers 151.7K Frequency 2 episodes / week Avg Length 28 min Listen on Apple Video Podcast YouTube Play

6. Veteran's Minimum

Veterans Minimum is a Sports & Conversation show hosted by Nick 'The Lamb' Dais. Nick brings on a wide variety of guests on the show that features in-depth interviews with celebrities, musicians, comedians, athletes and reporters. Commentary from Nick and his co-hosts, which often times are his childhood friends, football analysis, sports betting coverage and many other sports in the current events

Podcast cms.megaphone.fm

Email

Apple Rating 4.9 / 5Facebook Followers 207Twitter Followers 3.8KInstagram Followers 9.9K Frequency 16 episodes / quarter Avg Length 62 min Listen on Apple YouTube Play

7. The Daily Juice

Sports betting picks in 15 daily minutes! BettingPros host Matt Perrault will be here for you every day all year round as we run through the most notable sports bets while providing our picks. Tune in for our rapid-fire shows covering every sport as you look to place your wagers.

Podcast podcasters.spotify.com

Email

Apple Rating 4.8 / 5Facebook Followers 217Twitter Followers 121Instagram Followers 15.5K Frequency 6 episodes / week Avg Length 12 min Listen on Apple Spotify Video Podcast YouTube Play

8. Beating The Book with Gill Alexander

Sports betting expert and Host of VSiN's 'A Numbers Game' on SiriusXM, Gill uncovers the best of sports handicapping including free picks, the ins and outs of gambling strategies, and the truth behind sports book and casino operations. Together with industry high stakes handicappers and sports wagering experts, Gill covers NFL, college football, MLB baseball, golf, horse racing, and more. Listen to this entertaining and informative podcast for a winning edge.

Podcast omny.fm

Host Gill Alexander

Producer VSiN Podcast Network

Email

Apple Rating 4.6 / 5Twitter Followers 55.1K Frequency 1 episode / week Avg Length 72 min Listen on Apple Spotify Play

9. Good Bettor Bets

Digs, Todd McComas, & Gumpy cover everything you need to know in the gambling world including all the locks, all the insight, and who you should be fading. You've come to the right place if you're looking for the good, better, and best bets.

Podcast podcasters.spotify.com

Hosts Anthony DiGuilio, Gump Cathcart

Apple Rating 4.9 / 5Twitter Followers 97 Frequency 4 episodes / week Avg Length 32 min Listen on Apple YouTube Play

10. Bet The Process

Jeff Ma and Rufus Peabody talk sports betting. Tune in to listen to this podcast.

Podcast soundcloud.com

Email

Apple Rating 3.8 / 5Twitter Followers 10.9K Frequency 2 episodes / month Avg Length 61 min Listen on Apple YouTube Play

11. WagerTalk Podcast

Nothing beats the thrill of winning and the WagerTalk Podcast prepares you to make the most educated bets possible. Listen to WagerTalk each and every Thursday night as they break down sports from a Las Vegas betting perspective. Each week get free sports picks, sports predictions and betting odds direct from Las Vegas and our team of expert sports handicappers. Each and every week industry leading handicapping experts share their sports betting tips and advice on the biggest sporting events to help you beat the spread and make money

Podcast wagertalk.com

Email

Apple Rating 4.3 / 5Facebook Followers 13.2KTwitter Followers 63KInstagram Followers 18K Frequency 3 episodes / day Avg Length 32 min Listen on Apple YouTube Play

12. Be Better Bettors

Spanky discusses life as a professional sports bettor and interviews other professional bettors and bookmakers.

Podcast podcasters.spotify.com

Email

Apple Rating 4.7 / 5Twitter Followers 11.1K Frequency 8 episodes / year Avg Length 64 min Listen on Apple Play

13. The Betting Predators

We are a sports betting podcast, and our main objective is hunting down the best bets for you!

Podcast podcasters.spotify.com

Email

Apple Rating 4.8 / 5Facebook Followers 181Twitter Followers 1.8KInstagram Followers 45 Frequency 2 episodes / week Avg Length 38 min Listen on Apple YouTube Play

14. TheLines Podcast

The mission of TheLines is to provide our readers with sharp analysis and opinion from our team of sports betting industry experts. And that's exactly what we do on our sports betting podcast, covering the biggest, most important, and often the most ridiculous stories from the past week. Listen in as Matt Brown and Brett Collson cut through the crap and tackle the topics you need to know about.

Podcast thelines.com

Producer The Lines

Email

Apple Rating 5 / 5Twitter Followers 6K Frequency 11 episodes / quarter Avg Length 36 min Listen on Apple YouTube Play

15. Vegas ScoreBoard Express Live!

Award-Winning Sports Betting Podcast with Host JBTheTicket gives you the BEST in sports analysis and bets from top handicappers you can ca$h in! Get great offers from our sponsors! Live from Las Vegas #GetTheMoney!

Podcast spreaker.com

Email

Apple Rating 5 / 5 Frequency 2 episodes / week Avg Length 51 min Since Dec 2020 Listen on Apple Spotify Video Podcast YouTube Play

16. The Sharp 600

Give us 10 minutes and we'll give you the arsenal necessary to successfully navigate the sports betting market. 600 seconds of vital sports wagering information brought to you by San Francisco sports radio host and Covers.com analyst Joe.

Podcast covers.com

Email

Apple Rating 5 / 5Facebook Followers 17.4KTwitter Followers 162.8KInstagram Followers 21.6K Frequency 1 episode / quarter Avg Length 18 min Listen on Apple YouTube Play

17. Matchbook Betting Podcast

Matchbook's betting expert's Jesse May and Aidan O'Sullivan are joined by an array of hosts and special guests to preview the best betting action in the coming week's sport and provide a rare glimpse into the world of high-stakes betting. We are delighted that we have been nominated for Best Betting Podcast in the 2019 Smart Betting Club Awards.

Podcast matchbook.libsyn.com

Email

Apple Rating 4.8 / 5Facebook Followers 23.7KTwitter Followers 30.7K Frequency 1 episode / week Avg Length 40 min Listen on Apple YouTube Play

18. Business of Betting Podcast

A podcast about the business side of the betting, wagering and investing world.

Podcast shows.acast.com

Email

Apple Rating 4.6 / 5Twitter Followers 8.9K Frequency 1 episode / month Avg Length 36 min Listen on Apple Video Podcast YouTube Play

19. Kelly and Murray

'Kelly and Murray' is a Las Vegas-based sports betting podcast with industry experts Kelly Stewart and John Murray. Straight from the best gambling city in the world, it's the only podcast around that combines a sports bettor with a bookmaker and they've been friends for over a decade.

Podcast kellyandmurray.libsyn.com

Email

Apple Rating 4.7 / 5Twitter Followers 8.7K Frequency 1 episode / week Avg Length 47 min Listen on Apple Play

20. Bolt Brady and His Bro

The Bolt Brady and His Bro Podcast is great for sports fans to hear current sporting events being discussed. Providing their insights on how they see these events playing out. Would you like to make money off these sporting events through 'Sports Investing'? Bolt Brady and his Bro are actual brothers who hail from the West Coast. They've played sports and know athletics inside and out. The guys will cover all the major events, and give Free picks. NFL, College Football, NBA, MLB, Golf, and College basketball, etc. The Bolt Brady and his Bro podcast is a must for Sports Gamblers.

Podcast soundcloud.com

Email

Apple Rating 4.8 / 5Facebook Followers 285Twitter Followers 216Instagram Followers 5K Frequency 1 episode / week Avg Length 32 min Listen on Apple YouTube Play

21. LSR Sports Betting & News Podcast

The staff at Legal Sports Report breaks down the emerging US sports betting industry each week, taking a closer look at industry news and new efforts to legalize wagering across the country. Filled with analysis and interviews with industry and legislative sources, the LSR Podcast is a must-listen to keep up to speed with sports betting as it spreads legally in America.

Podcast legalsportsreport.com

Email

Apple Rating 4.8 / 5Facebook Followers 784Twitter Followers 14.8K Frequency 1 episode / week Avg Length 28 min Listen on Apple YouTube Play

22. Absolute (sports betting) Degeneracy

Sports betting conversations from gambling degenerates. Every week we talk about our bets in football, basketball, baseball, hockey, horse racing, and ufc.

Podcast redcircle.com

Email

Apple Rating 4.2 / 5Twitter Followers 1.7K Frequency 4 episodes / week Avg Length 33 min Listen on Apple Play

23. Final Furlong

In association with AtTheRaces.com: Emmet Kennedy and Kevin Blake are joined by an array of guests from the world of horse racing to preview the biggest races and chat about all the big talking points during the Flat and the National Hunt seasons.

Podcast cms.megaphone.fm

Email

Facebook Followers 3.4KTwitter Followers 24.1KInstagram Followers 153.5K Frequency 3 episodes / week Avg Length 85 min Since Jan 2019 Listen on YouTube Play

24. Covering the Spread

A sports-betting podcast that uses analytics to find edges across the sporting landscape. Hosted by Jim Sannes of numberFire and Dr. Ed Feng of The Power Rank.

Podcast coveringts.libsyn.com

Email

Apple Rating 4.4 / 5Facebook Followers 1.1MTwitter Followers 1.6KInstagram Followers 200.3K Frequency 3 episodes / week Avg Length 18 min Since Jul 2019 Listen on Apple YouTube Play

25. Locked On Bets

Your daily one-stop shop for all your sports betting needs. Locked On Bets provides everything you need to be prepared for any day in sports gambling. Hosted by Your Boy Q with expert analysis and insight from Lee Sterling. From the Lock of the Day to Why The Wrong Team is Favored and all in 20 minutes or less. Part of the Locked On Podcast Network.

Podcast lockedonpodcasts.com

Email

Apple Rating 4.3 / 5Twitter Followers 8.3KInstagram Followers 4.1K Frequency 30 episodes / year Avg Length 15 min Listen on Apple Spotify YouTube Play

26. Racing Post

Expert betting and tipping podcasts from the world of horse racing, football, golf and more.

Podcast audioboom.com

Email

Twitter Followers 13.9KInstagram Followers 104.7K Frequency 2 episodes / week Avg Length 48 min Listen on YouTube Play

27. Even Money Podcast

A former player talking NFL betting lines? Yep!! Ross Tucker will be joined by Pregame.com's Steve Fezzik to offer a truly unique perspective for NFL bettors. Fezzik is known as an 'advantage player,' a style of wagering that relies heavily upon the use of probability, statistics and other mathematical techniques to maximize the 'expected value' of wagers.

Podcast podcastone.com

Email

Apple Rating 4.6 / 5Facebook Followers 10.7KTwitter Followers 281.4KInstagram Followers 46.9K Frequency 1 episode / year Avg Length 33 min Listen on Apple Spotify Video Podcast YouTube Play

28. Bet Bath & Beyond

Bet Bath & Beyond is a sports betting podcast hosted by 2 Midwest guys looking to make a lot of money. Spoiler, they don't. However, if you want entertainment mixed with useful stats, up to date betting odds, and a lot of sports talk, then you've come to the right place. New episodes every Tuesday/Friday!

Podcast podcasters.spotify.com

Email

Apple Rating 5 / 5Facebook Followers 154Twitter Followers 169Instagram Followers 841 Listen on Apple YouTube Play

29. Today in Sports Betting

Today in Sports Betting from Hoop-Ball.com is a cutting dose of daily betting card handicapping. This is NOT a show to sell picks. None of our Pros sell their info. This show is all about learning how to read a card, handicap, and then, how to do it yourself.

Podcast podcasts.apple.com

Email

Apple Rating 4.9 / 5Facebook Followers 348Twitter Followers 6K Play

30. Play It As It Lies

The #1 sports betting podcast for news, numbers, and hot takes! Hosts Rotem Kaufman and Frank Platko offer hard-hitting analysis on odds, props, and everything in-between.

Podcast podcasters.spotify.com

Apple Rating 4.8 / 5Twitter Followers 199Instagram Followers 165 Listen on Apple Play

Show 31 to 1336
